com.percussion.pso.restservice
Class ItemService

java.lang.Object
  com.percussion.pso.restservice.ItemService

public class ItemService
extends Object

Business layer package service that calls to the lower level CRUD package service allowing exposure to clients via "web services" which in this case is REST.

Author:
erikserating
